Text:
function EP02_08()

    --.承-2【4月第2週】「努力値を振れ、話はそれからだ」
    SaveData.Title = "努力値を振れ、話はそれからだ"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav",0)

    --//BU：アキラ（焦り・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Anxious・Loungewear
 "What?! Lira Hoozuki, that reader model?!" ]])

    MSG([[ When I returned to report to Akira, I got an unexpected reaction. I never thought Akira would know Lira-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Anxious・Loungewear
 "Looks like we’re already going to be up against someone crazy... It’s like skipping the Gym Leader battle and jumping straight to the Elite Four." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0272.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised・Casual Clothes
 "Akira, you know Lira-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "Anyone in our generation who doesn’t know Lira Hoozuki is seriously out of the loop." ]])

PLAY_SE("SEb033.wav")
--WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Akira said that as she took several fashion magazines off the bookshelf and lined them up on the desk. All the covers feature Lira-san prominently. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "Lira is the number one popular reader model in the teen fashion magazine ‘Honey Teen.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "Her skill in stylishly rocking mass-market brands is unparalleled. In terms of teen popularity, she’s not inferior even to Hermes Himegami." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "You could say she’s the ultimate charismatic JK*." (*JK = Japanese high school girl) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0273.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry Smile・Sweat・Casual Clothes
 "A— a charismatic JK as my opponent, huh..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’m already at a disadvantage just by being a guy, and now there’s even less hope of winning. What on earth am I supposed to do? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Loungewear
 "You’re surprisingly calm. Until now, I’d expect you to be screeching ‘Pigi!’ or something." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0274.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry Smile・Sweat・Casual Clothes
 "W-well... I’m starting to get used to it, plus I’m really just challenging something unreasonable from the start." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0275.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry Smile・Sweat・Casual Clothes
 "I thought I should just do my best to live up to the title ‘Princess.’" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My mood is surprisingly positive, even to my own disbelief. That’s thanks to Ouga-kun’s encouraging words. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe sensing my feelings, Akira smiles happily too. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear
 "I’m relieved you’re looking on the bright side, Minachin. If you keep that up, you’ll be able to endure the cross-dressing training I planned to start today." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised・Casual Clothes
 "C-cross-dressing training?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Grinning・Loungewear
 "Have you forgotten the purpose of the BokuHime PROJECT? From the start, our goal was to become equal to the academy’s ‘Princesses,’ right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Grinning・Loungewear
 "That’s why I’ve prepared various things in advance. First, take a look at this." ]])

    MSG([[ On the smartphone Akira held up, my status screen appears. ]])

    MSG([[ The [Spirit] gauge seems to have grown quite a bit since the last time I saw it, which makes me a little happy. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though it’s for cross-dressing, I still feel good seeing my abilities improve. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0181.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "Thanks to weekend training, you were able to strengthen your mental state somewhat. Because of that, you managed to get through today, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0277.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual Clothes
 "Y-yeah. It was rough treatment, but I think it worked. I was fine when I faced Lira-san, after all." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "That said, Minachin’s cross-dressing is still half-baked. Starting today, you need to train your visuals and education as well." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0183.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious・Loungewear
 "So from now on, you’ll focus on increasing one of your status stats each week." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious・Loungewear
 "Based on your academy experience, choose the status you think you need most right now." ]])

    MSG([[ Saying that, Akira thrust the smartphone screen right in front of my nose. ]])

    MSG([[ Visuals, education, or mental power. I think all are important, but which should I prioritize now? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0278.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual Clothes
 "What kind of training does each involve? Of course, the contents are different for all three, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Grinning・Loungewear
 "That’s a corporate secret. If I told you the training details, you might hesitate and not choose some." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s mouth curls into an amused smile. Are there really some training contents that would make me hesitate...? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_0186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "This is an extremely important choice. Time is limited. There are less than three months until the Princess Election." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "Since I don’t know the academy’s realities, I can’t make the right call. You have to be careful and decide for yourself, Minachin." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0279.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Sad・Casual Clothes
 "Hmm..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0200.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Loungewear
 "So, what training will it be today? Since your opponent is Lira Hoozuki, I think going with visuals when in doubt is fine." ]])

    MSG([[ This choice could impact the outcome of the Princess Election. As for what I’ll choose―― ]])

    --//選択肢

    -- //選択肢

    -- 　①ビジュアルの訓練
    -- 　　 ⇒ アキラの服を色々と着せられるイベント

    -- 　②教養の訓練
    -- 　　 ⇒ 女装で色々な食事イベント

    -- 　③精神の訓練
    -- 　　 ⇒ アキラと女装した状態での添い寝イベント

    local result = TrainingSelect()

STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- 選択肢分岐
    Training(result , "EP02_09")
end
